typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Title as string,
		Description as string,
		OldPrice as string,
		NewPrice as string,
		discount as string,
		link as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Damage as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1 derive(DiscountPercentage = toInteger(left(right(discount,3),2)),
		discountasstring = right(discount,3),
		Company = left(Title,locate(' ',Title)-1),
		Inch = regexExtract(Title,'(\\d\\d)'),
		ProductID = substring(link,locate("ID",link),10),
		cm = toInteger(multiply(toInteger(regexExtract(Title,'(\\d\\d)')),2.54))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		Title,
		OldPrice,
		NewPrice,
		link,
		DiscountPercentage,
		discountasstring,
		Company,
		Inch,
		ProductID,
		cm
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(Company != 'HUMAX') ~> Filter1
Filter1, source2 join(Select1@ProductID == source2@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		Title,
		OldPrice,
		NewPrice,
		link,
		DiscountPercentage,
		discountasstring,
		Company,
		Inch,
		ProductID = Select1@ProductID,
		cm,
		Damage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['outlettvEdited.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		Title,
		Company,
		OldPrice,
		NewPrice,
		DiscountPercentage,
		discountasstring,
		Inch,
		ProductID,
		cm,
		link
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
Select2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['outletTvDetails'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
